SEARCH
Package Graph

Class Graph

java.lang.Object
Graph.Graph
public class Graph extends Object
This class is responsible for defining a graph and its properties - nodes and edges.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Graph()
    Creates a new graph with nodes and edges.

      node2 - The second node of the edge

      n2 - The second node of the edge

    • increasePheromoneLevel

      public void increasePheromoneLevel(double gamma, ArrayList<Integer> path)
      Increases the pheromone level of each edge in a given path.
      Parameters:
      gamma - The pheromone increase factor
      path - The path for which to increase the pheromone level

    • getEdgeFromNode

      public Edge getEdgeFromNode(Node currentNode, Node neighborNode)
      Returns the edge that connects two given nodes.
      Parameters:
      currentNode - The current node of the edge
      neighborNode - The neighboring node of the edge
      Returns:
      The edge that connects the two nodes

    • decreasePheromoneLevel

      public void decreasePheromoneLevel(double rho)
      Decreases the pheromone level of each edge in the graph.
      Parameters:
      rho - The pheromone evaporation rate

    • isEdgeInPath

      public boolean isEdgeInPath(Node n1, Node n2, ArrayList<Integer> path)
      Checks if an edge is in a path.
      Parameters:
      n1 - The first node of the edge
      n2 - The second node of the edge
      path - The path to check
      Returns:
      True if the edge is in the path, false otherwise

    • getTotalEdgeWeight

      public int getTotalEdgeWeight()
      Returns the total weight of all edges in the graph.

      Clears the graph of all nodes and edges.

      node1 - The first node
      node2 - The second node
      Returns:
      True if an edge exists between the two nodes, false otherwise

    • printGraph

      public void printGraph()
